description:
LISTEN TO THE END! 
EVERYTHING WHAT’S GOING ON AND WHAT IS TO COME❗️

YALE UNIVERSITY REPORT a SCHEME
HOW TO CONTROL the MESSAGING and TARGET the POPULATIONS
 People will be Bird Fed (Bit by Bit the Information)
Yale and the Media WILL Message Effectiveness and Safety of Vaccines - CONtinuously.
The Yale Report asks us to ""imagine"" just how responsible we will feel for others getting sick if WE do NOT get Vaccinated.
We ARE Told Covid-19 is limiting our personal freedom and WE must work together to get people vaccinated so we can preserve our Personal Freedom - a LIE. 
Covid is limiting our economic Freedom and by working together to get enough people vaccinated society can preserve its economic freedom - a LIE.
Self-Interest Messaging - that Covid-19 presents a real danger to one's health, even if one is young and healthy.  Getting vaccinated against Covid-19 is the best way to prevent oneself from getting sick - a LIE.
Messaging about the dangers of Covid-19 to the health of loved ones.  The more people who get vaccinated against Covid-19, the lower the risk that one's loved ones will get sick.  Societies must work together and all get vaccinated. A LIE.

FOR MORE CONTENT AND TRUTH! 🔥🔥
